thread.title: Larry
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Larry

author: Larry
title: Larry
text: Very clean store with courteous and helpful staff. Wrote a check for the purchase and the store practice of using a tablet to take photos was extremely inefficient. Everyone in the store including the manger could get it to work. Wasted 20 minutes of my time as well as your staff time
